General.Name: SmartKem, Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: SmartKem, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, develops in-house the materials necessary to fabricate OTFT devices. It provides TRUFLEX semiconductor polymers which enable low temperature printing processes that are compatible with existing manufacturing infrastructure to deliver low-cost displays. The company offers electronic polymer platform is used in display technologies, such as MicroLED, miniLED and AMOLED, as well as in applications in advanced chip packaging, sensors, and logic. It also provides prototypes for customers. SmartKem, Inc. was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Manchester, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Manchester Technology Centre, Manchester, United Kingdom, M9 8GQ
